pci_workflow_onboarding_content1: You have not yet created a Workflow.
pci_workflow_onboarding_content2: Automate your tasks to manipulate your cloud resources, based on your business logic, to address each situation.
pci_workflow_onboarding_content3: You can schedule Workflow executions to run tasks on your infrastructure. We pre-configured common Workflows to help you. For example, automated backups on Instances, automated snapshot on Block Storage and more.
pci_workflow_onboarding_content4: You can also directly use the OpenStack Mistral API to manage advanced Workflows.
pci_workflow_onboarding_content5: Workflow creation, scheduling and execution are free, only the resources created by Workflows will be charged.
